newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: RUGBY UNION-ACT BEATS WELLINGTON 38-29.
newsitem.headline: RUGBY UNION-ACT BEATS WELLINGTON 38-29.

text.p: The ACT Brumbies beat the Wellington Hurricanes 38-29 (halftime 22-6) in a Super 12 match at Athletic Park on Sunday to book themselves a home semi-final.
ACT - Tries: Mitch Hardy (2), George Gregan, Owen Finegan, Joe Roff, . Conversion: David Knox (2). Penalties: Knox (3).
Wellington Hurricanes - Tries: Filo Tiatia, Christian Cullen (2). Penalties: Jon Preston (3). Conversion: Preston
